name: Siege Defender
description:
Siege Defender is an  2D action packed survival game where you have to defend your home from endless waves of enemies whilst managing your resources. 

There is different types of enemies that all want to destroy your home.

There is food, health and bomb pickups that replenish your resources, they will randomly spawn on the platforms.

Each wave gets more difficult to make the game more exciting.

Challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score.

Have fun!!!

I just like to mention that this is the first game I am releasing and any feedback would be amazing. I will update and maintain the game based on the feedback and I would like to learn as much possible from this experience.

Also a shout out to Blackhammer.co which is where I got the character art and animation from.  You can check them out at https://connect.unity.com/u/black-hammer
